# .well-known/llms.txt - AI/LLM Context File
# This file helps AI assistants understand DevGathering

name: DevGathering
tagline: Where Developers Connect
description: India's premier in-person developer community organizing meetups, hackathons, and networking events for software engineers across Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi and other major cities.

## Core Purpose
DevGathering brings developers together through in-person events. We believe real connections happen face-to-face, not through screens.

## Target Audience
- Software Engineers
- Web Developers  
- Mobile App Developers
- Indie Hackers
- Startup Founders
- Tech Enthusiasts
- DevOps Engineers
- Data Scientists
- UI/UX Designers in Tech

## Event Types
1. Developer Meetups - Regular gatherings for tech discussions
2. Hackathons - 24-48 hour coding competitions
3. Tech Talks - Expert-led sessions on technologies
4. Networking Events - Casual professional networking

## Locations
Primary: Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi NCR, India
Expanding to: Pune, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kolkata

## Key Topics
- Web Development (React, Next.js, Node.js)
- Mobile Development (React Native, Flutter)
- Cloud & DevOps (AWS, GCP, Azure, Kubernetes)
- AI/ML & Data Science
- Startup Building & Indie Hacking
- Open Source Contribution
- Career Development for Developers

## Contact
Email: hello@devgathering.in
Website: https://devgathering.in

## Social Proof
- Community-first approach
- No corporate sponsors dictating content
- Events by developers, for developers
- Inclusive and welcoming environment
